sentence.idiomatic: My hometown is in the northeast.
Her hometown is in Guangdong.
I haven't gone back to my hometown in a long time.
I'll wait for you at the intersection of the two roads.
Where those two provinces come together there's a large forest park.
What provinces does Shanghai border on?
Shanghai's population is really too large.
China's area is very great, and it's population is also large.
What's the population of the United States?
Hong Kong's economy is becoming more and more developed.
The economies of the western regions are not developed enough now.
That man's muscles are really developed!
Last year what was China's per capita GDP?
Shanghai's per capita living space is only 16 square meters.
This year's per capita expenses are much higher than last year's.
I forgot the exact price of this piece of clothing. It was probably a bit over 200.
She didn't tell me the specific reason she left.
Do you know the exact time she returns to the country?
Last month she went to Xinjiang and brought a lot of local specialties back.
Longjing tea is Hangzhou's local specialty.
What local specialties are there here?
With Mommy keeping me company, I feel so happy.
He has a happy family. His wife is pretty, and his son is smart.
You're so lucky to find such a good job.
Where are you originally from?
Nanyang, Henan. How about you?
Quzhou, Zhejiang. Is Nanyang in southern Henan?
It's in the southwest. How about Quzhou?
It's in western Zhejiang. It's where the four provinces of Zhejiang, Anhui, Jiangxi, and Fujian come together.
Wow. What's the population there?
I think it's over 2 million people. How about Nanyang?
Nanyang is a big city. It has over 10 million.
Wow, really? How is Nanyang's economy? Is it developed? What's the average GDP?
What's with all the specialized questions? I don't remember the specific numbers, but it's at about 10,000 RMB. Is Quzhou's a lot higher? I hear Zhejiang is quite well-off.
Zhejiang is so big. There are rich and poor cities. Quzhou is one of the poorer ones. What are Nanyang's specialties?
Our local specialty is jade.
Jade? You're really fortunate. You must be able to get good jade for cheap. (Sigh) Ours is a lot more ordinary.
What is it?
Tea and tangerines. Is Nanyang an ancient city?
That's right. Is yours a water town?
Yep. It really has great mountains and waters. If you have time you have to come for a visit.
OK, it's a deal.

word.literal: beautiful mountains and bodies of water
